results.title: Inhibition of HMGCoA reductase by simvastatin protects mice from injurious mechanical ventilation
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Leukocytosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007964 @@@Lavage pleocytosis@@@ and @DISEASE_Neutrophilia_Hereditary @DISEASE_MESH:C563010 @@@neutrophilia@@@ were induced by HVt but were significantly attenuated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Manitsopoulos N, Orfanos SE, Kotanidou A, Nikitopoulou I, Siempos I, Magkou C, Dimopoulou I, Zakynthinos SG, Armaganidis A, Maniatis NA. Inhibition of HMGCoA reductase by simvastatin protects mice from injurious mechanical ventilation Respir Res. 2015 Feb 14;16(1):24. PMID: 25848815
citations.BibTeX: @article{25848815, title={Inhibition of HMGCoA reductase by simvastatin protects mice from injurious mechanical ventilation}, author={Manitsopoulos N and Orfanos SE and Kotanidou A and Nikitopoulou I and Siempos I and Magkou C and Dimopoulou I and Zakynthinos SG and Armaganidis A and Maniatis NA}, journal={Respir Res}, volume={16}, number={1}, pages={24}}

results.title: Granulocyte-CSF induced inflammation-associated cardiac thrombosis in iron loading mouse heart and can be attenuated by statin therapy
results.text_hl: I+G @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ shows @<m>DISEASE_Leukocytosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007964 @@@leukocytosis@@@ and systemic elevation of @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ profile which can be attenuated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ but not by @CHEMICAL_Tirofiban @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077466 @@@tirofiban@@@ treatment

citations.NLM: Lian WS, Lin H, Cheng WT, Kikuchi T, Cheng CF. Granulocyte-CSF induced inflammation-associated cardiac thrombosis in iron loading mouse heart and can be attenuated by statin therapy J Biomed Sci. 2011 Apr 15;18(1):26. PMID: 21496220
citations.BibTeX: @article{21496220, title={Granulocyte-CSF induced inflammation-associated cardiac thrombosis in iron loading mouse heart and can be attenuated by statin therapy}, author={Lian WS and Lin H and Cheng WT and Kikuchi T and Cheng CF}, journal={J Biomed Sci}, volume={18}, number={1}, pages={26}}
